New Records: Anthony Edwards made NBA history by becoming the player aged 23 or younger with the most career games with 6+ made threes
Key Match Events: The Minnesota Timberwolves erased a 19-point deficit to defeat the LA Clippers
Kawhi Leonard struggled in his 20 minutes of action, converting on just three of his 11 field goal attempts
Pre-Game Insights: Ty Lue told reporters pregame that Kawhi Leonard would not close the game no matter the score
Post-Match Reflections: This was an impressive showing from Edwards, and more importantly a big win for Minnesota at home
The Timberwolves now have that tiebreaker should it come into play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edwards hit six threes in the win over LA
The Timberwolves swept their season series with the Clippers
